message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase a product that is worth a significant amount to you. While I can't disclose the specific details just yet, I can assure you that it has the potential to generate substantial value for your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,400,000. This represents a fair price that allows me to achieve my desired return while offering you a substantial savings compared to its true worth. Please consider this offer carefully, as it's a one-time opportunity. I'm confident that this acquisition will be mutually beneficial for both of us.
